patient_summary.visit_summary: You visited today because of chest pain that started last night and has been getting sharper. The doctor found the pain is located on the last side of your chest and is sharp, but not radiating anywhere else. You will need to keep an eye on the pain and seek urgent care if it worsens or you feel lightheaded again.

tests_ordered.instructions: You may be asked to remove any jewelry or clothing that could interfere with the test.
tests_ordered.timeline: As soon as possible, ideally within the next few hours
tests_ordered.evidence: I think it's pretty sharp, yeah. Sharp.

follow_up_plan.action: Monitor your chest pain and seek urgent care if it worsens or you feel lightheaded again.
follow_up_plan.evidence: You will need to keep an eye on the pain and seek urgent care if it worsens or you feel lightheaded again.

lifestyle_recommendations.recommendation: Try to eat healthy for dinner at least, and consider reducing your smoking and alcohol intake.
lifestyle_recommendations.evidence: I try to eat healthy for dinner at least.

red_flags_for_patient.warning: If you feel lightheaded or experience worsening chest pain, seek urgent care immediately.
red_flags_for_patient.evidence: You will need to keep an eye on the pain and seek urgent care if it worsens or you feel lightheaded again.

questions_and_answers.question: Will I be able to breathe normally after this?
questions_and_answers.answer: It's hard to say right now, but we'll monitor your breathing and adjust treatment as needed.

questions_and_answers.question: Can you tell me more about my family history of heart problems?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, your father had a heart attack at 45, which is concerning. We'll keep that in mind during our evaluation.
questions_and_answers.evidence: My father had a heart attack when he was 45.

findings: Location of pain: last side of the chest
Duration of pain: started last night, becoming sharper over time
Characteristics of pain: sharp, burning, achy
evidence: I'm just having a lot of chest pain, and so I thought I should get it checked out.
People will use words sometimes like sharp burning, achy. I think it's pretty sharp, yeah.

physical_exam: Location of pain: last side of the chest

evidence: I feel a little lightheaded, and I'm having some trouble breathing.

action_items.evidence: I'm just having a lot of chest pain, and so I thought I should get it checked out.; People will use words sometimes like sharp burning, achy. I think it's pretty sharp, yeah.
